title: Loan Schema
description: Data schema defining the characteristics of a loan product.

id.description: The unique identifier for the loan within the financial institution.

accrued_interest_balance.description: The accrued interest due at the next payment date. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

administration.description: How the loan was administered by the lender.

arrears_arrangement.description: The arrangement the lender has made with the borrower regarding the amount referenced in the arrears_balance.

arrears_balance.description: The balance of the loan or capital amount that is considered to be in arrears. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

asset_liability.description: Is the loan an asset or a liability on the firm's balance sheet?

balance.description: The balance of the loan or capital still to be repaid. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

base_rate.description: The base rate represents the basis of the repayment rate on the borrowed funds at the given date as agreed in the terms of the loan.

customers.description: The list of customers for this loan

id.description: The unique identifier for the customer/s within the financial institution.

income_amount.description: The reference income used for the customer(s) for this loan. Monetary type represented as an integer number of cents/pence.

ccf.description: The credit conversion factor that indicates the proportion of the undrawn amount that would be drawn down on default.

encumbrance_amount.description: The amount of the loan that is encumbered by potential future commitments or legal liabilities. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

encumbrance_end_date.description: Date encumbrance amount goes to zero. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601

facility_currency_code.description: The currency of the credit facility if not the same as loan currency_code.

first_payment_date.description: The first payment date for interest payments.

guarantee_amount.description: The amount of the loan that is guaranteed by the guarantor. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

guarantor_id.description: The unique identifier for the guarantor of the loan.

impairment_amount.description: The impairment amount for a loan is the allowance for loan impairments set aside by the firm that accounts for the event that the loan becomes impaired in the future.

impairment_type.description: The loss event resulting in the impairment of the loan.

interest_repayment_frequency.description: Repayment frequency of the loan interest, if different from principal.

issuer_id.description: The unique identifier for the issuer of the loan.

last_payment_date.description: The final payment date for interest payments, often coincides with end_date.

limit_amount.description: The total credit limit on the loan. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

lnrf_amount.description: The total amount of non-recourse funding linked to the loan. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

movement.description: The movement parameter describes how the loan arrived to the firm.

next_payment_date.description: The next date at which interest will be paid or accrued_interest balance returned to zero.

notional_amount.description: The original notional amount of the loan. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

on_balance_sheet.description: Is the loan reported on the balance sheet of the financial institution?

originator_id.description: The unique identifier used by the financial institution to identify the originator of the loan product.

originator_type.description: The type of financial institution that acted as the originator of the loan product.

prev_payment_date.description: The most recent previous date at which interest was paid or accrued_interest balance returned to zero.

product_name.description: The name of the product as given by the financial institution to be used for display and reference purposes.

provision_amount.description: The amount of reserves that is provisioned by the financial institution to cover the potential loss on the loan. Monetary type represented as a naturally positive integer number of cents/pence.

provision_type.description: The provision type parameter details the provisions the issuing firm has allocated to cover potential losses from issuing a loan.

purpose.description: The underlying reason the borrower has requested the loan.

rate.description: The full interest rate applied to the loan balance. Note that for tracker rates this includes the benchmark (ie. not the credit spread). Percentages represented as a decimal/float such that 1.5% is 0.015.

rate_type.description: Describes the type of interest rate applied to the loan.

regulated.description: Is this loan regulated or unregulated?

repayment_type.description: Repayment type of the loan refers to whether the customer will be repaying capital + interest, just interest or a combination of the two.

reporting_lei.description: The LEI code for the legal entity under which the loan is being reported.

reporting_entity_name.description: The name of the reporting legal entity for display purposes (as LEI code may not be available).

risk_country_code.description: Two-letter country code describing where the risk for the security resides. In accordance with ISO 3166-1

risk_weight_std.description: The standardised approach risk weight represented as a decimal/float such that 1.5% is 0.015.

risk_weight_irb.description: The internal risk weight represented as a decimal/float such that 1.5% is 0.015.

secured.description: Is this loan secured or unsecured?

source.description: The source where this data originated.

sources.description: Identifiers for data sources. Useful for analytics and MI purposes.

start_date.description: The timestamp that the trade or financial product commences. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

status.description: Describes if the loan is active or been cancelled.

trade_date.description: The timestamp that the trade or financial product terms are agreed. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

type.description: The form of the loan product administered by the financial institution, with regards to common regulatory classifications.

version_id.description: The version identifier of the data such as the firm's internal batch identifier.

vol_adj.description: The volatility adjustment appropriate to the exposure.

count.description: Describes the number of loans aggregated into a single row.

minimum_balance_eur.description: Indicates the minimum balance, in Euros, of each loan within the aggregate.
